.. _apptainer_checkpoint_delete:

apptainer checkpoint delete
---------------------------

Delete a checkpoint (experimental)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The checkpoint delete command will remove all state for the given checkpoint.

::

  apptainer checkpoint delete <name>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    To delete a checkpoint:
    $ apptainer checkpoint delete example-checkpoint

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for delete

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer checkpoint <apptainer_checkpoint>` 	 - Manage container checkpoint state (experimental)

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 29-Oct-2025*
